VecField¶

class decodes.core.dc_line.VecField(pixel_res=ival[8.0,8.0], spatial_origin=pt[0,0,0], spatial_dim=ival[4.0,4.0], initial_value=vec[0,0,0], include_corners=False, wrap=True)¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_color.PixelGrid

A raster grid of vectors.
Each pixel contains a positioned 3d vector (a Ray).
__init__(pixel_res=ival[8.0,8.0], spatial_origin=pt[0,0,0], spatial_dim=ival[4.0,4.0], initial_value=vec[0,0,0], include_corners=False, wrap=True)¶

Vector field constructor.

Parameters:
  • pixel_res (Interval) – Resolution of vector grid.
  • spatial_origin (Point) – Center of vector field.
  • spatial_dim (Interval) – Dimension of vector field.
  • initial_value (Vec) – Start value for vector field.
  • include_corners (bool) – Boolean Value.
  • wrap (bool) – Boolean Value.
Result :

A vector field.
Return type:

VecField
address_near(a, b=None)¶

Returns location of vector near the given location. May be passed either a point or an x,y coordinate.

Parameters:
  • a (float or Point) – x-coordinate or Point.
  • b (float or None) – y-coordinate or None.
Result :

Location of vector.
Return type:

int, int
addresses_near(a, b=None)¶

Returns locations of vectors near the given location. May be passed either a point or an x,y coordinate.

Parameters:
  • a (float or Point) – x-coordinate or Point.
  • b (float or None) – y-coordinate or None.
Result :

List of locations.
Return type:

[tup]
avg_vec_near(a, b=None)¶

Returns an average vector from the near vectors around the given location. May be passed a point or an x,y coordinate.

Parameters:
  • a (float or Point) – x-coordinate or Point.
  • b (float or None) – y-coordinate or None.
Result :

An average vector.
Return type:

Vec
cpt_near(a, b=None)¶

Returns center point of cell nearest to given location. May be passed either a point or an x,y coordinate.

Parameters:
  • a (float or Point) – x-coordinate or Point.
  • b (float or None) – y-coordinate or None.
Result :

Center point of near cell.
Return type:

Point
cpts_near(a, b=None)¶

Returns center points of cells near the given location. May be passed either a point or an x,y coordinate.

Parameters:
  • a (float or Point) – x-coordinate or Point.
  • b (float or None) – y-coordinate or None.
Result :

List of center points near given location.

rtype: [Point]

get_cpt(x, y)¶

Returns the center point of the cell associated with the given address.

Parameters:
  • x (float) – x-coordinate
  • y (float) – y-coordinate
Result :

Center point of cell.
Return type:

Point
spin_pt(a, b=None)¶

Rotates vectors in a VecField around a given point. May be passed a point or an x,y coordinate.

Parameters:
  • a (float or Point) – x-coordinate or Point to rotate around.
  • b (float or None) – y-coordinate or None.
Result :

VecField object.
Return type:

VecField
to_rays()¶

Returns a list of Rays that correspond to the Vecs from the Vector Field.

Result :A list of Rays.
Return type:[Ray]
vec_near(a, b=None)¶

Returns closest vector to the given location. May be passed either a point or an x,y coordinate.

Parameters:

  • b (float or None) – y-coordinate or None.
Result :

Nearest Vec.
Return type:

Vec
